page.title: 13Children in School
page.content: Children at school have lots of fun doing lots of things like painting,drawing,writing and modelling. At break time and lunch break children play together.Some of the children in school are rough some are kind and not so rough.We also do swimming and gym. They also do work on the computer,maths,and topic like The Civil War.Also they read and write stories,and the library van comes once a term.We also have exhibits from the museum,like an otter.We have our own swimming pool.We also have a P.E. hall. Children take Proficiency tests, B.A.G.A awards and A.S.A swimming tests.On sports day the juniors divide into 3 houses, Langtree, Iknield, D,Oyley.Sometimes we do plays for the school and sometimes we have vistors.
